name: Agricultural Laboratory
desc: Research facilities capable of cultivating better plant life and improving husbandry practices.

name: Atmosphere Regulator
desc: Massive industrial vents and pumps that combine, store, and release gases from deep inside the earth.

name: Construction Grid
desc: A single-use structural grid for building megastructures.

name: Element Synthesizer
desc: Research facility for creating and developing rare minerals with unique properties.

name: Geomorphology Station
desc: Facilities for research and subjugation that can manage inhabitants and modify surface conditions.

name: Mineral Replicator
desc: Research facility for creating and developing common minerals with unique properties.

name: Planetary Hologram
desc: Holographic emitters are launched around the planet's atmosphere, changing the planet's visuals to a desired type.

name: Stellar Manufactory
desc: Stellar factories that are capable of creating and launching stellar shades and mirrors into orbit.

name: Terrestrial Engine
desc: Deep-earth facilities that can influence a planet's tectonic or gravitational activities.

name: Unification Center
desc: A centralized government is made to issue mandates that force the population towards certain goals.
